title: [1.7.2-5,1.6.4][SSP/SMP]雪糕三文治苦力怕-Ice Cream Sandwich Cre...
author: jeff-luke
txt_content:
本帖最后由 jeff-luke 于 2014-4-8 17:54 编辑 

复制代码           图片君已挂！！请各位在网盘直接查看图片！！
           今天在DLS看到一个不错的MOD，就搬来了。
           这是本人第一次发MOD，也是第一次搬运MOD，不足之处请见谅。
           {:10_523:}我需要人气RQ和金币JB（别想其他的）{:10_512:}
           发现我家电脑上网(ao)特慢，过了1min才上到DLS{:10_530:}
           本人是英(yu)语(wen)渣渣，所以有翻译不好的见谅(不是机翻)
           ================分割线================ 

                    图片君：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1sj54UZF  


             
作者的话：每个人都喜欢好吃的冰淇淋三明治。
                没有人喜欢一个坏的苦力怕。
            我决定将这两个不同的物体一起创造的冰淇淋三明治苦力怕。


              这个MOD增加了6个不同口味的苦力怕。
              玩家如果杀掉冰淇淋三文治苦力怕，就会得到冰淇淋三文治。
              如果你靠太近，它会爆成一堆冰淇淋！ 


      增加物品：6种口味冰淇淋、苦力怕、冰淇淋三文治
                    从左到右：香草，巧克力，草莓，薄荷巧克力，未知
                       图片君： http://pan.baidu.com/s/1eQf2Y22  
       

     其他：冰淇淋苦力怕死后有百分之一的几率掉落 头骨
               冰淇淋与巧克力片合成冰淇淋三文治
               直接吃冰淇淋加半个饥饿值，有33%几率
               "getting a devastating brain freeze effect "不知道什么意思
        原话：请各位告诉我怎样用黄框和双引号将东西括起来！！！
               请版主对此手下留情，我将尽量改正
““         Everybody likes a good ice cream sandwich. Nobody likes a bad creeper. One modder decided to combine those two different objects together to create the Ice Cream Sandwich Creeper Mod for Minecraft.
This mod adds 6 new flavors of ice cream to the game and 6 new types of creepers. Players also earn ice cream sandwiches after killing a creeper, but if you get too close to a creeper, they explode into a pile of ice cream.
Basically, this mod makes creepers more fun and delicious than ever before. Here is what has been added to the game:
-6 new flavors of ice cream and ice cream sandwiches, including Vanilla, Strawberry, Chocolate, Mint Chocolate Chip, Orange Sherbet, and Neapolitan
-6 new types of creepers based on all the flavors just listed
-Ice Cream Sandwich armor which lets players experience ice cream-related bonus effects when wearing the full set of armor
-Ice Cream Sandwich swords and other blocks
-Icecreamification bombs which transform regular creepers into Ice Cream Sandwich creepers
Creepers are more than just walking, growling ice cream machines. They also have a 1% chance of dropping a decorative skull of their flavor when killed.
Eating an ice cream sandwich will restore 3 food slots on your hunger meter. You can also craft ice cream sandwiches yourself without killing creepers. To do that, combine Ice Cream and Chocolate Wafers.
If you try eating Ice Cream on its own, then you’ll earn half a food bar on your hunger meter, but you also have a 33% chance of getting a devastating brain freeze effect for 15 seconds. Brain freeze will slow movement.
Ice Cream Sandwich creepers only spawn in cold environments and they often blend into the terrain, so players are encouraged to keep their eyes peeled.
If you like Ice Cream Sandwiches and have always thought that Minecraft was lacking in your favorite treat, then the Ice Cream Sandwich creeper mod is a great one to try out today.””


好像还有冰淇淋剑神木的，请各位在回复中纠错！


        安装方法：    

                       步骤1）下载并安装Minecraft Forge
                       步骤2）将.zip文件放入mods文件夹                       步骤3）删除META-INF文件夹                       步骤4）开始享受玩的乐趣吧！
                原话：              Step 1) Download and install Minecraft Forge(<<链接）
                     Step 2) Download the latest version of the Ice Cream Sandwich Creeper Mod from download link here
                     Step 3) Drag and drop the mod’s .zip folder into the .minecraft/mods folder
                     Step 4) Delete the META-INF folder
                     Step 5) Start playing and enjoy!
               其中步骤2已被省掉！

         为了让大家更方便，人气到5就填度娘网盘


          最后，喜闻乐见的下载地址：www.在下面.net

                                                    *
                                                   *

                                                  *

       下载地址：在上面 顺着"*"走(点点试试）



              图片君（们）： http://my.poco.cn/album/album_show_photo_list.php?user_id=174689098&set_hash=0  




             




                   请各位大大帮忙汉化！





                    
                  
                                    
                         地址就是   www.在下面.net
